## HealthCheckResult interface

Describes the payload returned when checking the health of a data source plugin.

<b>Signature</b>

```typescript
export interface HealthCheckResult 
```
<b>Import</b>

```typescript
import { HealthCheckResult } from '@grafana/runtime';
```
